trans-unit.source: Retrieves exports from a catalog.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CatalogExportProvider"></xref> class with the specified catalog.

The catalog that the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CatalogExportProvider"></xref> uses to produce <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> objects.
catalog is .
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CatalogExportProvider"></xref> class with the specified catalog and optional thread-safe mode.

The catalog that the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CatalogExportProvider"></xref> uses to produce <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> objects.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this object must be thread-safe; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
catalog is .
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CatalogExportProvider"></xref> class with the specified catalog and composition options.

The catalog that the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CatalogExportProvider"></xref> uses to produce <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> objects.
Options that determine the behavior of this provider.
catalog is .
Gets the catalog that is used to provide exports.

The catalog that the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CatalogExportProvider"></xref> uses to produce <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> objects.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"></xref> has been disposed of.
Releases all resources used by the current instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CatalogExportProvider"></xref> class.
Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CatalogExportProvider>.
The `Dispose` method leaves the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CatalogExportProvider> in an unusable state.

After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CatalogExportProvider> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CatalogExportProvider> was occupying.
For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
> [!NOTE] > Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CatalogExportProvider>.
Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CatalogExportProvider> object's `Finalize` method.
Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CatalogExportProvider"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
Returns all exports that match the conditions of the specified import.
Implementers should not treat cardinality-related mismatches as errors and should not throw exceptions for cardinality-related mismatches.

For example, if the import requests exactly one export and the provider has either no matching exports or more than one, the GetExportsCore method should return an empty <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> collection of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export> objects.
The conditions of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> objects to be returned.
The composition transaction to use, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to disable transactional composition.
A collection that contains all the exports that match the specified condition.
Gets or sets the export provider that provides access to additional exports.
You must set this property before you access any methods on the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CatalogExportProvider> object.

The export provider that provides the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CatalogExportProvider"></xref> access to additional <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> objects.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CatalogExportProvider"></xref> has been disposed of.
value is .
This property has already been set.
-or- The methods on the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CatalogExportProvider"></xref> object have already been accessed.
